<<<<<<< HEAD
The case of such professors as have known the way of truth, and are turned aside from its holy testimony to save themselves, opened and lamented : with some wholsome warnings and admonitions, tending to restore and turn them again to the Lord, that they may be saved by him, both from the evil of sin and punishment. Whitehead, John, 1630-1696.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., London : 1662.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Broadside. Signed: John Whitehead.
=======

Whitehead, John, 1630-1696.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., London : 1662.
